heroSection.muchoDescription: Unique experience where luxury and comfort meet
heroSection.bitezDescription: Special experience where luxury and tranquility meet in the unique beauty of the Aegean

Welcome.title: WELCOME TO INONE BITEZ
Welcome.description: We are here to provide you with a unique holiday experience with our adult-only concept in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most prestigious bays.

Featured.title: INONE HOTELS
Featured.description: Experience the enchanting atmosphere of Inone Bitez, combining adult-only luxury with BB and HB concepts on the Aegean coast. Peaceful holiday in the heart of nature.

Contact.title: CONTACT US
Contact.description: Contact us by phone or email, or through the chat in the bottom right corner. Click on Call Me Back for a callback.
Contact.locationDescription: Discover the beauties of Bodrum, one of Turkey's and even the world's leading holiday destinations with its clear bays and historical texture.

footer.address: Adliye Cd, Kanberoğlu Sk. No:85, 48400 Bodrum/Muğla

inoneBitez.heroSubtitle: Special experience where luxury and tranquility meet in the unique beauty of the Aegean
inoneBitez.aboutDescription1: Located in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most prestigious bays, our hotel blends modern luxury with the timeless beauty of the Aegean with its adult-only concept. With a 16+ age restriction, we offer unforgettable memories to our guests in this unique location exclusively for adults.
inoneBitez.aboutDescription2: You will experience a holiday in harmony with nature with every detail carefully designed on 2770 m² area. We are proud to offer accommodation beyond your expectations with our In One+ assistant service and premium service approach.
inoneBitez.feature1Description: Peaceful and calm atmosphere exclusively for adults with 16+ age restriction
inoneBitez.feature2Description: Maria's Garden Restaurant experience with Bed & Breakfast and Half Board options
inoneBitez.feature3Description: All details of your holiday are thought of with personal assistant service
inoneBitez.feature4Description: Special facilities to vacation with your pets up to 10 kg
inoneBitez.roomsDescription: Experience the pinnacle of comfort in modern rooms and suites designed in the peaceful atmosphere of Bitez
inoneBitez.room1Description: Modern design rooms with garden-park view, 20m² area, 2 adult capacity.
inoneBitez.room2Description: Our suites with garden view, 35m² area, 3 adult capacity, separate sitting area.
inoneBitez.locationDescription: We are ideally located 7 km from Bodrum city center and 39 km from Bodrum-Milas Airport. You can also easily reach historical places like Bodrum Castle and Halicarnassus Mausoleum.
inoneBitez.address: Adliye Cd, Kanberoğlu Sk. No:85, 48400 Bodrum/Muğla

bitezRooms.pageDescription: Experience an unforgettable stay in our rooms where modern comfort meets the unique beauty of the Aegean with our adult-only concept
bitezRooms.deluxeRoomDescription: Our 20m² deluxe rooms with garden-park view offer a luxurious accommodation experience with King Size bed, LCD TV, marble flooring and special mini bar.
bitezRooms.suiteRoomDescription: Experience the pinnacle of comfort in our 35m² suite rooms with garden view, King Size bed, separate sitting area, LCD TV and premium amenities.
bitezRooms.servicesDescription: Experience unforgettable moments with our premium services to make your stay even more special
bitezRooms.beachServiceDescription: All your holiday needs are met with personal assistant service
bitezRooms.roomServiceDescription: Special welcome drinks, free valet parking and room guide
bitezRooms.housekeepingDescription: Unique flavors of Mediterranean cuisine at Maria's Garden Restaurant
bitezRooms.spaServiceDescription: Discover the crystal bays of Bodrum with In One+
bitezRooms.contactDescription: Contact us for detailed information about our rooms and to make a reservation

deluxeRoomDetail.heroDescription: Experience a peaceful stay with adult-only concept in our 20m² Deluxe Room with garden-park view.
deluxeRoomDetail.roomDescription: Our 20m² Deluxe Room brings the tranquility of nature into your room with garden-park view. Experience modern comfort with King Size bed, LCD TV, marble flooring and shower cabin. Your comfort is complete with air conditioning, water heater and non-alcoholic mini bar.
deluxeRoomDetail.beachServiceDescription: All your needs are met with personal assistant service
deluxeRoomDetail.roomServiceDescription: Special welcome drinks and welcome gift
deluxeRoomDetail.reservationDescription: Book now for an unforgettable holiday in our Deluxe Room. A peaceful vacation with adult-only concept awaits you.

suiteRoomDetail.heroDescription: Experience luxury accommodation with separate sitting area and premium amenities in our 35m² Suite Room with garden view.
suiteRoomDetail.roomDescription: Our 35m² Suite Room offers King Size bed, separate sitting area and garden view. Discover the pinnacle of comfort with marble flooring, LCD TV, private bathroom and premium amenities. All your needs are considered with In One+ service.
suiteRoomDetail.beachServiceDescription: Premium experience with fast check-in and personal assistant service
suiteRoomDetail.conciergeServiceDescription: Special welcome gift and farewell gift
suiteRoomDetail.reservationDescription: Book now for a VIP holiday in our Suite Room. A special experience with adult-only concept awaits you.

aboutUs.heroDescription: We are proud to offer unforgettable experiences to our guests with adult-only concept in the unique beauty of Bitez, in the heart of the Aegean
aboutUs.storyDescription1: Inone Bitez is a boutique hotel designed with adult-only concept (16+) in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most beautiful bays. On 2770 m² area, we offer the perfect harmony of nature's enchanting beauty and modern luxury.
aboutUs.storyDescription2: Our hotel, serving from May 1 to October 31, 2025, offers flexible accommodation options to our guests with BB and HB concepts. We provide a unique holiday experience to our guests with our In One+ assistant service and Maria's Garden Restaurant experience.
aboutUs.valuesDescription: Special facilities we offer to provide the best service to our guests
aboutUs.excellenceDescription: Peaceful atmosphere exclusively for adults with 16+ age restriction
aboutUs.hospitalityDescription: All details of your holiday are considered with personal assistant service
aboutUs.sustainabilityDescription: Holiday opportunity with your pets up to 10 kg
aboutUs.luxuryDescription: Mediterranean cuisine experience by famous chef Maria Ekmekçioğlu
aboutUs.locationDescription1: Our facility, located at Adliye Cd, Kanberoğlu Sk. No:85, is situated in Bitez, the heart of Bodrum. We are 7 km from Bodrum city center and 7.2 km from the historical Bodrum Castle.
aboutUs.locationDescription2: Our hotel, 39 km from Bodrum-Milas Airport and 15 km from Yalikavak Marina, offers easy access to all important points in the region. Important tourist spots like Halicarnassus Mausoleum and Bodrum Marina are also within walking distance.
aboutUs.teamDescription: Special service packages prepared to provide the best service to our guests

HotelsInfo.title: INONE HOTELS
HotelsInfo.subtitle: A unique experience with adult-only concept in Bodrum Bitez. Unforgettable memories and peaceful moments await you.
HotelsInfo.muchoDescription: Located in Bitez, one of Bodrum's most prestigious bays, Inone Bitez Hotel offers a calm holiday experience exclusively for adults with its adult-only concept (16+). You will find peace in this special place where modern comfort and Aegean hospitality meet on 2770 m² area.
HotelsInfo.muchoFeatures: Adult Only concept, Special Events, Beach Parties, Pet friendly (10kg), BB & HB options, Yacht tours
HotelsInfo.bitezDescription: Located in the enchanting atmosphere of the Aegean, Inone Bitez Hotel offers the perfect harmony of luxury and comfort with adult-only concept. Every detail designed with boutique hotel approach provides a special and unforgettable holiday experience for our 16+ guests.
HotelsInfo.bitezFeatures: BB & HB accommodation, Maria's Garden Restaurant, VIP transfers, Yacht tours, Pet friendly facilities

Gallery.title: GALLERY
Gallery.subtitle: Discover the enchanting atmosphere, modern design and natural beauty of Inone Bitez with adult-only concept

earlyBooking.title: Honeymoon Special Package
earlyBooking.description: Special welcome, in-room wine and romantic Iconic Pier dinner

longStay.title: Birthday Celebration
longStay.description: Unforgettable celebration with VIP transfer, party at Iconic Beach and special cake

honeymoon.title: In One+ Premium
honeymoon.description: All your holiday details are considered with personal assistant service

hotel.title: About Hotel
hotel.description1: Experience an unforgettable holiday in our hotel designed with adult-only concept (16+). Every detail is thought for your comfort with Maria's Garden Restaurant, In One+ assistant service and pet friendly facilities.
hotel.description2: We offer you a perfect holiday with Iconic Beach access, yacht tours and VIP transfer services. Relax in our modern rooms offering flexible accommodation options with BB & HB choices.

plane.title: BOOK YOUR FLIGHT NOW
plane.subtitle: Easily reach our hotel 39 km from Bodrum-Milas Airport with reliable airline partners.
plane.bottomText: You can safely make all your reservation transactions and find the most suitable flight options to Bodrum. Enjoy comfortable journey from airport to our hotel with our VIP transfer service.

contactPage.title: CONTACT
contactPage.subtitle: Our dynamic team will be happy to assist you with making reservations, providing information about services offered, or meeting your individual needs. Your comfort and satisfaction are our priority and we are always happy to be in touch with you.
contactPage.address: Bitez District, İnönü Street No:123, Bodrum/Muğla, Turkey
